work: Epistle to the Son of the Wolf
author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: * فی هذا الحين ارتفع صرير قلمی الاعلی و قال وصّ حضرة الشّيخ بما وصّيت به احد اغصانک لعلّ نفحات البيان تجذبه و تقرّبه الی اللّه ربّ العالمين *
translation: At this moment the shrill voice of the Most Sublime Pen hath been raised, and hath addressed Me saying: "Admonish the Shaykh even as Thou hast admonished one of Thy Branches (sons), that haply the breezes of Thine utterance may attract and draw him nigh unto God, the Lord of the worlds."
